law.catch_line: A court of this State may communicate with a court in another state concerning a proceeding arising ...

section.section: A court of this State may communicate with a court in another state concerning a proceeding arising under this title.
The court may allow the parties to participate in a communication described in paragraph (1) of this subsection.
Except as otherwise provided in subsection (b) of this section, the court shall make a record of the communication.
A record described in this paragraph may be limited to the fact that the communication occurred.

text.section: A court communicating with a court in another state under this section may communicate concerning schedules, calendars, court records, and other administrative matters without making a record.
